messages.text: What's going on in my house?

Between 8:45 AM and 11:00 AM, there was significant activity.  The **garage and backyard motion sensors** were triggered, an **unknown person was recorded at the entrance**, and the **kitchen door and window were opened**.  Later, around 3:30 PM, there was **suspicious activity near the side gate**.  Finally, at 8:15 PM, an **unknown vehicle was recorded nearby**.  I recommend reviewing camera footage from these times for further investigation.  The system reported secure at 11:00 AM and 7:30 PM, but several sensor issues occurred throughout the day.

VIGIL AI Security Summary

Significant Events

  • 8:45 AM - 10:00 AM: Multiple motion sensor triggers (garage, backyard), unknown person at entrance, kitchen door and window opened. Review Camera 1 footage.
  • 3:30 PM: Suspicious activity near side gate. Check camera footage for details.
  • 8:15 PM: Unknown vehicle recorded nearby. Review Camera 3 footage.
Investigate suspicious activity at 3:30 PM and the unknown vehicle at 8:15 PM. Review all relevant camera footage.

System Status

System reported secure at 11:00 AM and 7:30 PM, but experienced several sensor issues throughout the day.

VIGIL AI Security Summary

Significant Events (April 9th, 2025)

  • 8:45 AM - 10:00 AM: Multiple motion sensor triggers (garage, backyard), unknown person at entrance (Camera 1), kitchen door and window opened.
  • 3:30 PM: Suspicious activity near side gate.
  • 8:15 PM: Unknown vehicle recorded nearby (Camera 3).
Review Camera 1 (8:45 AM - 10:00 AM), and Camera 3 footage (3:30 PM & 8:15 PM). Investigate suspicious activity and unknown vehicle.
System reported secure at 11:00 AM and 7:30 PM, but experienced sensor issues and multiple events throughout the day. Further investigation recommended.

VIGIL AI Security Summary - April 9th, 2025

Significant Events

  • 8:45 AM - 10:00 AM: Multiple motion sensor triggers (garage, backyard), unknown person at entrance (Camera 1), kitchen door and window opened.
  • 3:30 PM: Suspicious activity near side gate.
  • 8:15 PM: Unknown vehicle recorded nearby (Camera 3).
Review Camera 1 (8:45 AM-10:00 AM) and Camera 3 footage (3:30 PM & 8:15 PM). Investigate suspicious activity and unknown vehicle.
Numerous sensor issues and events occurred. System reported secure at 11:00 AM and 7:30 PM. Further investigation recommended.
